short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A extension to customize the new tab page with a space theme.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Custom Galaxy Theme is a Chrome extension that transforms your new tab page into a mesmerizing space-inspired experience. With a design that draws inspiration from the cosmos, this theme turns your new tab into a breathtaking vista of deep space, where planets, stars, and nebulae shine brightly.
